amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to express the sense of Congress stating the importance and benefits of projects to improve 2-way traffic safety on high volume, deep draft navigation channels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Babin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
